testcase.name: testSelectById

error.message:
### Error querying database. Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server. ### The error may exist in com/itheima/mapper/UserMapper.java (best guess) ### The error may involve com.itheima.mapper.UserMapper.selectById ### The error occurred while executing a query ### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.
